posts.author: DragonatorXII
posts.content:
I had a rather interesting concept pop in my head. I was thinking a shady bard halfling that had a prime agenda of causing mayhem and trouble. Ideally the race would be Halfling, and would be of an evil alignment. As for classes, I was thinking along the lines of at the very least 16 bard levels. I would much rather be built for facing off other players than spawns.

Some class combinations I had thought may be good for this concept; Rogue/Bard, Bard/Blackguard, Bard/Fighter,

What I'm really looking for
-Armor Class
-PvP Survivability

Damage on this build doesn't concern me too much. I'm mostly interested in AC and Saves. Decent AB would be under those two in my list. For feats, I was thinking something like..

Curse Song
Expertise
Weapon Focus
Knockdown
Blind FIght
Improved Critical
Improved Expertise
Epic Weapon Focus
Armor Skin
Epic Prowess
Lasting Inspiration (If I have the 20 levels. That's more of a cookie than a necessity)
